column1: #Text=Katara says : " Wow , these flowers are beautiful . "
#Text=" Hama says : " You can take it even further .
#Text=It 's a shame about the lilies , though .
#Text=When you 're a waterbender in a strange land , you do what you must to survive .
#Text=Tonight I 'll teach you the ultimate technique of waterbending .
#Text=It can only be done during the full moon , when your bending is at its peak .
#Text=" Katara says : " But is n't that dangerous ?
#Text=I thought people have been disappearing around here during the full moon .
#Text=Two master waterbenders beneath a full moon ?
#Text=I do n't think we have anything to worry about .
